column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Word of the wise: if you're planning to spend a whole day there
column2: pace yourself. It's a big place. Don't spend too much time reading every individual placard in a room of statues you're not interested in
column3: because you'll get fatigued. Prioritize the art pieces that you really want to see. Eat beforehand
column4: if you're like me and don't want to pay for an overpriced museum snack.
